org.pepstock.charba.client.utils

Class CScheduler.RunnableWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.utils.CScheduler.RunnableWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    CScheduler

    private static final class CScheduler.RunnableWrapper
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Wrapper of user task in order to clear timeout the user logic is completed.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
